data.title: Many of Your Favorite Films Have Been Shot in San Pedro
data.meta_description: San Pedro is a favorite location for filming both movies and television programs, along with commercials. Hundreds of films have been shot in whole or part within the Los Angeles Harbor area, dating to the earliest days of the U.S. cinema industry.
data.text:
San Pedro is a favorite location for filming both movies and television programs, along with commercials.

Hundreds of films have been shot in whole or part within the Los Angeles Harbor area, dating to the earliest days of the U.S. cinema industry.

Below is a list of many films and television programs shot in San Pedro. There are many more, of course, and as you travel around town you might start to recognize locations that were used for programs and films you have seen.

A Man Apart
